Lattice lscpcie2 Linux Device Driver Manual

Ver 2.0.1.5

This manual provides documentation on the theory and operation of the second generation of the lscpcie2 Device Driver. This driver has improved functionality over the original lscpcie.ko driver (very early PCIe demo releases) which simply allowed read/write access and reading back some driver and device configuration information.

Refer to the following sections for details on the following specific subjects:

  • Introduction to the lscpcie2 Driver

  • Driver Implementation Details

  • Building the Driver
